Author: Romuald Quantin - www.soundstep.com Resources: http://www.soundstep.com/downloads/somacore Class version: v1.0.0 Actionscript version: 3.0 Copyright: Mozilla Public License 1.1 (MPL 1.1) http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mozilla1.1.php

apiOperation.shortdesc: Registers a command to the framework.

apiParam.apiDesc: Event type that is used as a command name.
Class that will be executed when a command has been dispatched.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Registers a command to the framework.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Registers a model to the framework.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Registers a model to the framework.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Registers a view to the framework.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Registers a view to the framework.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Registers a wire to the framework.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Registers a wire to the framework.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Creates a plugin instance using the class name and the getDefinitionByName method.

apiParam.apiDesc: Class name of the plugin that will be instantiated.
Value Object class of the plugin.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Creates a plugin instance using the class name and the getDefinitionByName method.

example.codeblock: var pluginVO:SomaDebuggerVO = new SomaDebuggerVO(this, SomaDebugger.NAME_DEFAULT, getCommands(), true, false); var debugger:SomaDebugger = createPluginFromClassName("com.soma.core.debugger.SomaDebugger", pluginVO) as SomaDebugger;

apiOperation.shortdesc: Creates a plugin instance.

apiParam.apiDesc: Class of the plugin that will be instantiated.
Value Object class of the plugin.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Creates a plugin instance.

example.codeblock: var pluginVO:SomaDebuggerVO = new SomaDebuggerVO(this, SomaDebugger.NAME_DEFAULT, getCommands(), true, false); var debugger:SomaDebugger = createPlugin(SomaDebugger, pluginVO) as SomaDebugger;

apiOperation.shortdesc: Destroys the SomaCore core classes and elements registered to the framework.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Destroys the SomaCore core classes and elements registered to the framework.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Retrieves the command class that has been registered with a command name.

apiParam.apiDesc: Event type that is used as a command name.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Retrieves the command class that has been registered with a command name.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Retrieves all the command names (event type) that have been registered to the framework.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Retrieves all the command names (event type) that have been registered to the framework.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Retrieves the last sequence command that has been instantiated in the framework.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Retrieves the last sequence command that has been instantiated in the framework.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Retrieves the model instance that has been registered using its name.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Retrieves the model instance that has been registered using its name.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Retrieves all the model instances that have been registered to the framework.

apiReturn.apiDesc: A Dictionary (the key of the Dictionary is the name used for the registration).

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Retrieves all the model instances that have been registered to the framework.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Retrieves all the sequence command instances that are running.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Retrieves all the sequence command instances that are running.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Retrieves the sequence command instance using an event instance that has been created from this sequence command.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Retrieves the sequence command instance using an event instance that has been created from this sequence command.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Retrieves the view instance that has been registered using its name.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Retrieves the view instance that has been registered using its name.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Retrieves all the view instances that have been registered to the framework.

apiReturn.apiDesc: A Dictionary (the key of the Dictionary is the name used for the registration).

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Retrieves all the view instances that have been registered to the framework.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Retrieves the wire instance that has been registered using its name.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Retrieves the wire instance that has been registered using its name.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Retrieves all the wire instances that have been registered to the framework.

apiReturn.apiDesc: A Dictionary (the key of the Dictionary is the name used for the registration).

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Retrieves all the wire instances that have been registered to the framework.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Indicates wether a command has been registered to the framework.

apiParam.apiDesc: Event type that is used as a command name.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Indicates wether a command has been registered to the framework.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Indicates wether a model has been registered to the framework.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Indicates wether a model has been registered to the framework.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Indicates wether a view has been registered to the framework.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Indicates wether a view has been registered to the framework.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Indicates wether a wire has been registered to the framework.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Indicates wether a wire has been registered to the framework.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Indicates wether an event has been instantiated from a ISequenceCommand class.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Indicates wether an event has been instantiated from a ISequenceCommand class.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Removes a command from the framework.

apiParam.apiDesc: Event type that is used as a command name.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Removes a command from the framework.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Removes a model from the framework and call the dispose method of this model.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Removes a model from the framework and call the dispose method of this model.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Removes a view from the framework and call the (optional) dispose method of this view.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Removes a view from the framework and call the (optional) dispose method of this view.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Removes a wire from the framework and call the dispose method of this wire.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Removes a wire from the framework and call the dispose method of this wire.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Stops all the sequences command instances that are running.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Stops all the sequences command instances that are running.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Stops a sequence command using an event instance that has been created from this sequence command.

apiReturn.apiDesc: A Boolean (true if a sequence command has been stopped).

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Stops a sequence command using an event instance that has been created from this sequence command.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Stops a sequence command using the sequence command instance itself.

apiReturn.apiDesc: A Boolean (true if the sequence command has been stopped).

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Stops a sequence command using the sequence command instance itself.

apiValue.shortdesc: Get the stage that has been registered to the framework.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Get the stage that has been registered to the framework.
